profile.title: Profile
profile.description:
As a Senior Full Stack Engineer at KruPaul, I have over six years of experience delivering dynamic and interactive web solutions. Working with technologies such as ReactJS, Next.js, Strapi, and Sanity, I have collaborated with design and project management teams to translate wireframes into high-quality code. My contributions have focused on enhancing user experience, improving website functionality, and ensuring the timely delivery of projects.
My expertise lies in integrating front-end and back-end technologies to create responsive, high-performing websites that prioritize user engagement and accessibility. Dedicated to aligning technical solutions with client objectives, I aim to empower users through intuitive interfaces and dynamic functionality.

experience.title: Senior Full Stack Engineer
description: Collaborated with design and project teams to create better websites.
Diagnosed and troubleshot websites using modern technologies.
Translated wireframes into fast, interactive websites.

experience.title: Website Developer
description: Collaborated proactively with modern tech teams.
Worked with clients including Proofpoint, Alpha & Omega Semiconductor, Upwing Energy, and Colorado Department of Human Services.

experience.title: Content Creator
description: Created free chemistry video content for Thai high school students.
